channel.title: Thinkings on Fe3O4's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Thinkings on Fe3O4's Blog

item.title: No Special Days
item.description: Saying goodbye to festivals, live on you own and enjoy a happier life. Special days, usually known as festivals, are very common in our life and we’ve been involved in them nearly all the time. However, I think it’s time to say goodbye to them. It was just the last day of my term-ending exam that I heard something unacceptable. Hair cutting isn’t allowed in Lunar January due local customs.
